817d79be45b981321de3adddc19a626b6927f90a640c10eab","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://dbf5684fecd1417fd9a8e856ef6a216545501486b2a1fefb18f51e96fe1e605a","dweb:/ipfs/QmNUM7iPR6jKqLjHrLwEZ5NNcK3Qjoep5mhDn5fYAheZ8N"]}},"version":1}

params.increment: The amount to increase the multiplier by

allowance(saddress,saddress).details: See {ISRC20-allowance}. Returns actual allowance if caller is either the owner or the spender, returns 0 otherwise to maintain privacy.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be spent
params.spender: The address which will spend the funds

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded

params.account: The account to check the balance of

returns._0: The current balance in tokens, accounting for yield

params.from: The shielded address to burn from

params.admin: The address that will have admin rights

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds
params.subtractedValue: The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded

emitApproval(address,address,uint256).details: Implementation of emitApproval. No-op by default for privacy. Can be overridden to implement custom event emission behavior.

emitTransfer(address,address,uint256).details: Implementation of emitTransfer. No-op by default for privacy. Can be overridden to implement custom event emission behavior.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: The caller must have the admin role

params.addedValue: The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by
params.spender: The address which will spend the funds

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded

params.to: The shielded address to mint to

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: The caller must have the admin role

safeAllowance(saddress,saddress).details: Safe version of allowance that returns success boolean along with allowance. Returns (true, allowance) if caller is owner or spender, (false, 0) otherwise.

safeBalanceOf(saddress).details: Safe version of balanceOf that returns success boolean along with balance. Returns (true, balance) if caller is the account owner, (false, 0) otherwise.

returns._0: The amount of shares owned by the account, or 0 if caller is not the account owner

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

returns._0: The total supply of tokens, accounting for yield

transfer(saddress,suint256).details: Uses _update for share-based accounting while maintaining token-based interface

params.amount: The shielded number of tokens to transfer.
params.to: The shielded address to which tokens will be transferred.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

transferFrom(saddress,saddress,suint256).details: Uses _update for share-based accounting while maintaining token-based interface

params.from: The shielded address to transfer from
params.to: The shielded address to transfer to

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded

addRewardMultiplier(uint256).notice: Updates the reward multiplier to reflect new yield

allowance(saddress,saddress).notice: This is the exact same implementation as the one in SRC20.sol

approve(saddress,suint256).notice: Sets `amount` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens

balanceOf(saddress).notice: Override balanceOf to calculate balance based on shares and current reward multiplier

burn(saddress,suint256).notice: Burns tokens from a shielded address

decimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation.

decreaseAllowance(saddress,suint256).notice: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller

hasRole(bytes32,address).notice: Returns true if `account` has been granted `role`

increaseAllowance(saddress,suint256).notice: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller

mint(saddress,suint256).notice: Mints new tokens to a shielded address

paused().notice: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise

sharesOf(saddress).notice: Returns the amount of shares owned by the account

totalShares().notice: Returns the total amount of shares

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply of tokens

transfer(saddress,suint256).notice: Transfers a specified number of tokens from the caller's address to the recipient.

transferFrom(saddress,saddress,suint256).notice: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism
